name: Magnet Manoeuvre
description:
Magnet Manoeuvre is a fast-paced and minimalistic puzzle game that will test your reflexes and thinking skills. You control two magnets and can attract or repel them to dodge obstacles. 

Keep in mind that this is my first game jam and feedback would be much appreciated. Thanks and finish the final level for a surprise game mode...

Music is royalty free and can be found here:

https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/moose
